project.name: ember-cli-spree-checkouts
project.description: The default blueprint for ember-cli addons.

ember-cli-spree-core/mixins/checkouts.name: ember-cli-spree-core/mixins/checkouts
ember-cli-spree-core/mixins/checkouts.description: Provides Current Order and Checkout Functionality to the Spree service.

Spree Ember.Checkouts.name: Spree Ember.Checkouts
Spree Ember.Checkouts.description: Provides Current Order and Checkout Functionality to the Spree service.

classitems.description: Triggered whenever a Spree Server request fails.
classitems.name: serverError

params.name: error
params.description: The error object returned from the Spree Server.

classitems.description: Triggered whenever a Line Item is created or updated.
classitems.name: didAddToCart

classitems.description: Triggered whenever a new Order is created for the checkout user.
classitems.name: didCreateNewOrder

classitems.description: Triggered whenever the Current Order changes State.
classitems.name: checkoutStateDidChange

params.name: order
params.description: A string representing the new state.

classitems.description: Triggered whenever the Current Order reached it's "Complete" State.
classitems.name: currentOrderDidComplete

params.name: order
params.description: A string representing the new state.

classitems.description:
A method called in the `ember-cli-spree-checkouts` initializer after the
`Checkouts` mixin is applied to the Spree service, to initialize functionality
in this mixin.
classitems.name: initCheckouts

params.name: application
params.description: A reference to the initializing Application.

classitems.description:
A reference to the Current Order.  It is only set twice in this code,
once on Application initialization (in the case it was persisted), and once
when a new order is created through the internal method `_createNewOrder`.
classitems.name: currentOrder

classitems.description: Adds state machine functionality to the Spree service.
classitems.name: _setupStateMachineForOrder

params.name: order
params.description: A reference to the Current Order

return.description: Returns the newly instantiated StateMachine instance.

classitems.description:
An overrideable Array representing the possible states of the order, and it's
possible transitions.  This should be informed by the Spree backend. The default
values will work with Spree's default checkout steps.
classitems.name: eventsForOrderStateMachine

classitems.description:
An overrideable Object for binding callbacks to state changes in the Current
Spree Order.  `this` in these callbacks represents the Current Order object.
classitems.name: callbacksForOrderStateMachine

classitems.description:
If a state name is passed to this method, the state machine will attempt to
transition directly to that state.  If not, we will attempt to transition
to the next state in the checkout flow.
classitems.name: transitionCheckoutState

params.name: stateName
params.description: Optional, a state to attempt transition to.

return.description:
A dynamically created IIFE corresponding to a State
Machine event name.  See `eventsForOrderStateMachine`.

classitems.description:
This method will send data to Spree's Checkouts API in the format it expects.
It will also automatically transition the order to a certain state if it has
enough information to satisfy Spree's Order State Machine.
classitems.name: _updateOrderData

return.description:
A promise that resolves to either a successful
server response (that may contain errors in the payload), or an AJAX error.

classitems.description:
This method will attempt to force the Order's state to the next State.  It's
necessary for the "confirm" -> "complete" transition for Spree, and also useful
for triggering validation errors, when it's not clear why an order won't advance
to the next state.
classitems.name: _advanceOrderState

return.description:
A promise that resolves to either a successful
server response (that may contain errors in the payload), or an AJAX error.

classitems.description:
The token used to Authenticate the current user against the current order.  Persisted
to local storage via `ember-cli-spree-core/mixins/storable`.  This property is
sent to the Spree server via the header `X-Spree-Order-Token`.
classitems.name: guestToken

classitems.description:
The user's Current Order number, persisted to local storage via
`ember-cli-spree-core/mixins/storable`.  This property is sent to the Spree
server via the header `X-Spree-Order-Id`.
classitems.name: orderId

classitems.description:
A computed property that returns all of the countries (and states) set up in
Spree's backend.
classitems.name: countries

return.description:
Returns a promise that resolves to all of the
countries saved in the Spree backend.

classitems.description:
Adds a lineItem to the currentOrder. If there is no Current Order,
Spree Ember will request a new order from the server, and set it as the
Current Order on the Spree service.
classitems.name: addToCart

params.name: variant
params.description: A class of the variant model

params.name: quantity
params.description: A quantity for the Line Item.

return.description: A promise that resolves to the newly saved Line Item.

classitems.description:
An internal method for saving Line Items.  If it is called for a variant that
is already in the current order, it will add to the corresponding Line Item's
quantity, otherwise it will create a new Line Item for that variant.
classitems.name: _saveLineItem

params.name: variant
params.description: A class of the variant model

return.description:
A promise that resolves to the newly created or
updated `lineItem` object.

classitems.description:
Will attempt to create a new Order for the checkout user, and save the `orderId`
and `guestToken` to the Spree service, so that it will persist across page
refreshes.  It will also initiate the state machine for the current order.
classitems.name: _createNewOrder

return.description:
A promise that resolves to the newly created
Spree Order.
